articles.title: Genetics solves mystery of why some pandas are brown - Nature.com
articles.description: Chinese researchers find the gene responsible for the brown-and-white fur of a handful of giant pandas in China.

articles.title: Oldest known animal sex chromosome evolved in octopuses 380 million years ago - Nature.com
articles.description: Result reveals for the first time how some cephalopods determine sex.

articles.author: Paul Thurrott
articles.title: Google Announces a New Pixel Feature Drop - Thurrott.com
articles.description: Pixel fans have already received two Pixel Feature Drops in the past three months, but Google is back with a new Drop.
articles.content: Pixel fans have already received two Pixel Feature Drops in the past three months, but Google is back today with a new Feature Drop that adds several new features across compatible Pixel phones, tabl… [+3552 chars]

articles.title: iOS 17.4: Apple Confirms Surprise U-Turn For Next iPhone Update - Forbes
articles.description: Just days before the next big iPhone update is released, Apple makes a surprise announcement that goes back on what it’s said will happen on one key point.
articles.content: The next iPhone update is so close you can almost hear it coming in to land. There are many big changes coming, from a big iMessage security update to improvements to Stolen Device Protection. Now, A… [+5708 chars]
